name: DagdeelCodelijst_to_EventTiming
title: DagdeelCodelijst to EventTiming
description: Maps TimeOfDay codes as found in [zib InstructionsForUse v1.2.1 (2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/InstructionsForUse-v1.2.1(2020EN))) to Timing.repeat.when codes as found in FHIR R4
